content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Li. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, I am currently unavailable to negotiate at this time. Would you be interested in scheduling a follow-up meeting to discuss the rental price further?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I would be interested in scheduling a follow-up meeting to discuss the rental price further. Can you give me a date and a time?
name: Bo Li from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Li. How about tomorrow at 2:00 PM? Please let me know if that works for you, and I will send you a confirmation email with the details.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, that works for me. Thank you for your help. I look forward to our next meeting.
name: Bo Li from China

content: You're welcome, Mr. Li. I'm glad we could arrange a meeting to discuss the rental price further. I'll send you a confirmation email with the details, and I'll be looking forward to our next meeting as well.
name: Heinrich Heine
